name: e-store
description: E-store Project for Turing College Web-Dev course

scripts.demo: npm ci && npm run demo:env && npm run demo:launch
scripts.demo:env: cp packages/client/.env.example packages/client/.env && cp packages/server/.env.example packages/server/.env
scripts.demo:launch: (cd packages/client && npm run dev) & (cd packages/server && npm run dev:mem)
scripts.test: (cd packages/client && npm run test) & (cd packages/server && npm run test:mem)
scripts.biglint: (cd packages/client && npm run lint) & (cd packages/server && npm run lint)

author: Filipe Batista
